title: Any solutions for run two league of legends Clients on my Mac OS
body: > Hello everyone, I have an Oce account and also just registered a Japanese account, here is the question: can I have two league of legends client on my Mac, we all know that if u want to play at another region u need to re-download some part of client again, so do u guys have any idea to do that? Please help!!!

replies.body:
I'm not aware of any way to run more than one League Client instance at the same time. Doing so could cause a lot of problems, though, since both Clients could experience massive conflicts when creating or editing files inside the install directory simultaneously.

If you have any other questions, let me know!
